text: U.S. offers more details on claim China conducted secret nuclear weapons test - The Washington Post
fullText: Remarks by a top administration official appeared to be aimed at dispelling skepticism of its assertions, as President Donald Trump vows to restart U.S. tests.

text: Spurs signing veteran center Mason Plumlee to 10-day deal - ESPN
fullText: Free agent center Mason Plumlee is signing a 10-day contract with the San Antonio Spurs.

text: Mourinho's 'big mistake' after 'disgusting' Vinicius incident - BBC
fullText: Trent Alexander-Arnold calls the alleged racist abuse of team-mate Vinicius Junior a "disgrace to football", while opposition manager Jose Mourinho is criticised for his comments.

text: Why California could be the big winner as EPA abandons climate policy - Politico
fullText: The federal government is walking away from its tailpipe emissions rules, sparking a legal debate over whether states can now write their own standards.

text: Gisèle Pelicot’s memoir launches in 22 languages, turning horror into hope for survivors - AP News
fullText: Gisèle Pelicot has released a memoir that recounts her drugging and mass rape case and sends a powerful message of hope and support to victims of sexual abuse. On Tuesday, her book comes out worldwide in 22 languages. Pelicot says writing it helped her reflec…

text: DHS spokeswoman who became a face of Trump deportation campaign steps down - The Washington Post
fullText: Tricia McLaughlin is leaving just over a year into Homeland Security Secretary Kristi L. Noem’s tenure leading the department.

text: No bones about it: Judge allows Buffalo Wild Wings to keep 'boneless' chicken on menu - NBC News
fullText: The judge said in his ruling that Aimen Halim did not "drum" up enough evidence in his lawsuit arguing the "boneless wings" should be labeled "chicken nuggets."

text: Antarctica’s ‘Gravity Hole’ Has Been Quietly Growing Stronger - Gizmodo
fullText: Scientists aren't fully sure what this means for Antarctica's future, however.

text: Air Force One will sport Trump’s preferred paint job, after Air Force again reverses course - CNN
fullText: President Donald Trump’s preferred paint colors will be applied to the new planes which will serve as Air Force One, an Air Force official tells CNN.

text: Trump family business files for trademark rights on any airports using the president’s name - AP News
fullText: The Trump family company wants to trademark the use of the president’s name on any airports but says it doesn’t plan on charging a fee — at least for a proposed renaming of one near his Florida home. Applications filed by the Trump Organization with the feder…

text: Health officials warn of possible measles exposure at St. Louis Lambert Airport, Collinsville church - STLPR
fullText: An individual with a confirmed measles case was in the airport on Feb. 7. Meanwhile, Illinois health officials say the same person may have exposed people at Good Shepherd Lutheran Church in Collinsville.

text: Here’s how much snow the Sierra got this weekend — and how much is on the way - San Francisco Chronicle
fullText: Some California ski resorts tallied feet of snow over the past two days. More is coming.

text: Nine arrested in France over death of far-right student - BBC
fullText: Quentin Deranque died on Saturday, two days after being beaten in Lyon by masked men believed to be far-left militants.

text: Hegseth forces ouster of senior Army spokesman in latest internal clash - The Washington Post
fullText: Col. David Butler, who had been selected by senior Army leaders for promotion to brigadier general, will instead retire, officials said.

text: Oil Falls After Iran Calls Nuclear Talks With US Constructive - Bloomberg
fullText: Oil edged lower on signs that the US and Iran have made progress in nuclear talks, eroding a risk premium in benchmark futures prices.

text: Google shares how Android 17 is making everything run smoother - Android Authority
fullText: Google shares the technical details behind its new system to reduce missed frames in Android 17, now in beta testing.

text: State confirms outbreak of sexually transmitted fungal infection, experts urge caution - Fox News
fullText: The fungal skin infection TMVII is spreading in Minnesota through direct contact. Health experts advise medical care for round, red rashes that can be painful or itchy.
